name: Escape the Lab (itch) (LordBreakerX (AKA. Nathaniel Hachey))
description:
Escape the lab is a game I help make near the beginning of fall for a game jam for a part of the school. The game involves a little robot that can teleport between two dimensions and is trying to escape the lab. There are three levels in the game.

Credits

The game was created by a group of people for the game jam, here is the credits.

Jacob Giannone who did UI

Marko Kuper who did coding and level design

Jolanne Manalese who did level design

 Matthew Mcinerney who did audio

 Vladislav Volodin -who did coding

Jenny Sherwood  who did 3D and tech art

 Nathaniel Hachey (myself)  who did coding, level design, and some UI stuff
